title: Cross-Agent Operations
implementationNotes: Implemented getSharedMemories() for finding memories accessible to multiple agents with filtering. Added searchCrossAgent() with optional trust-weighted scoring combining relevance and agent trust level. Created copyMemory() for copying shared memories with source tracking (uses 'consolidated' method). Added collaboration events (memory:cross_agent_search, memory:copied, memory:cross_agent_access). Implemented recordCrossAgentAccess() for audit trail. Added getCollaborationStats() for sharing metrics. 18 new tests (68 total for MultiAgentMemoryManager).
impact: Enables memory operations across multiple agents

tasks.title: Implement getSharedMemories() Method
tasks.description: Get all memories shared between two or more agents with filtering by type and time range.

tasks.title: Implement Cross-Agent Search
tasks.description: Search across visible memories from multiple agents, ranking by relevance and optionally by trust level.

tasks.title: Add Trust-Weighted Scoring
tasks.description: When combining memories from multiple agents, weight by agent's trustLevel for ranking.

tasks.title: Implement Memory Copying
tasks.description: Allow agent to copy shared memory to own private store with source tracking and annotation support.

tasks.title: Add Collaboration Events
tasks.description: Emit events when agents share or access each other's memories for audit trail.
